page.title: 07TOP FARM L.BARFORD - Cattle.
page.content: The cows are all{Hereford cross {Fresian}they are used for beef.The bull is a{Charolais}used for beef breeding.When the cattle are slaughtered to make beef the bones,hooves and horns are used for glue and fertilizer.The blood is dried and used to make fertilizer.When the calves are born,which is in February,March and April they are kept and fed well for a year and then sold for beef. The reason the cattle are kept on the right side of the road is because this is the land nearest the river and floods easily.The ground is also mostly gravel and not that good for growing crops.
